name: Santa Camera: Catch Santa in your House PNP 2015
name_original: Santa Camera: Catch Santa in your House PNP 2015
description:
Add Santa to your own pictures to show that he was in your house, in your chimney, or outside! It's fun to show the kids and let them see that you caught Santa!

- Dozens of Santa images to choose from
- Use the photo editor to modify image pic, add text, and more
- BONUS wallpapers included

Ge the ultimate app for Christmas now!
